description.value: You make your foes fall painfully when you trip them. When you successfully @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Trip]{Trip} a @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} foe, your target takes [[/r 1d6[bludgeoning]]] damage. On a critical success, the target takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage plus your sneak attack damage.
